original_title: NPP tops postal votes in Colombo District
original_body_lines: The National People’s Power (NPP) has obtained the highest number of postal votes in the Colombo District in the 2024 General Election.
Accordingly, the NPP has polled 28,475 postal votes, while the Samagi Jana Balawegaya (SJB) placed second with 1,623 postal votes.
